title: Planted Steak Harvest Bowl
instructions: Cook quinoa or farro according to package instructions and set aside to cool slightly.
Roast seasonal vegetables (sweet potato, Brussels sprouts, beets) at 200°C (400°F) for 20-25 minutes until caramelized.
Season the planted.steak with salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil. Sear in a hot cast-iron pan for 2-3 minutes per side.
Let the steak rest for 2 minutes, then slice against the grain into strips.
Prepare a tahini dressing by whisking tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and water until smooth.
Assemble bowls with grains as the base, arrange roasted vegetables and fresh greens around the edges.
Top with sliced planted.steak, drizzle with tahini dressing, and garnish with pomegranate seeds and toasted pumpkin seeds.
